TextLibrary.Text: Travel to Quaris II to meet with Pirates.
Meet with the Pirates
You must be at least Allied with the Pirates.
You must be a Criminal according to the MRI.
Travel to Quaris IV to defend against the MRI.
Wait for the MRI Fleet
MRI Forces Arrive
Engage the Scouting Forces at Quaris IV.
Engage the Advance Forces
Enemy Scouts Defeated -- Prepare for main force
Engage MRI Space Superiority Vessels at Quaris IV.
Engage the Main Strike Force
Strike Force Retreating -- Prepare for Bombardment Vessels
Engage MRI Bombardment Vessels at Quaris IV.
Engage MRI Bombardment Vessels
Enemy Bombardment Vessles Eliminated -- Prepare for Enemy Reinforcements
Engage MRI Strike Force Reinforcements at Quaris IV.
Engage Enemy Reinforcements
Enemy Reinforcements Neutralized -- Prepare to Engage Ships Guarding the Command Center
Engage MRI Interceptors at Quaris IV.
Engage MRI Interceptors
Interceptors Destroyed -- Prepare to Engage Elite Guard
Engage MRI Elite Guard at Quaris IV.
Engage MRI Elite Guard
Elite Guard Eliminated -- Prepare to Strike the MRI Assault Captain
Engage MRI Captain at Quaris IV.
Engage MRI Captain
Enemy Formation Broken -- Prepare to Assault the MRI Command Center
Engage MRI Command Center at Quaris IV.
Engage MRI Command Center
Victory! PSI Weapon Aquired
